content:
Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: The only way to get diamonds is to break diamond blocks. Therefore I will first need to move the diamond block from slot 45 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I have 9 diamonds and can craft the shovel. But first I will need to store the diamonds in a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 12}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a diamond shovel, I need to place 1 diamond and 2 sticks in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the diamond from slot 12 into the crafting table at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]

thought: The diamond is now in the crafting table at slot 1, so I need to move the stick into the crafting table at slot 4. This is because the stick needs to be placed below the diamond in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]

thought: The first stick is now in the crafting table at slot 4, so I need to move the second stick into the crafting table at slot 7. This is because the second stick needs to be placed below the first stick in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]
thought: The diamond shovel is now in the crafting table at slot 0, so I need to move it into the inventory at slot 13. This is because I need to use the diamond shovel to complete the task.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
